Privacy Policy

Last updated: 25/03/2025

1. Introduction

Welcome to Trainedtails.com (“we,” “us,” or “our”). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and subscribe to our newsletter and email marketing communications. By using our website, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

2. Information We Collect

Personal Information

  • Email Address: We collect your email when you sign up for our newsletter or other marketing communications.
  • Optional Information: You may also provide your name or other contact details when voluntarily submitting comments or inquiries.

Usage Data

  • Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies to enhance user experience, analyze site traffic, and support our marketing efforts.
  • Log Data: Automatically collected information such as your IP address, browser type, and access times.

3. How We Use Your Information

  • Newsletter and Email Marketing: To send you updates, promotions, and news related to dog training.
  • Affiliate Promotions: To inform you about products or services through affiliate links, for which we may earn a commission.
  • Improving Our Services: To analyze usage and enhance our website’s functionality and content.

4. Sharing and Disclosure

  • Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, managing email communications, or processing payments.
  • Affiliate Links: Some content includes affiliate links. If you make a purchase through these links, we may earn a commission at no additional cost to you.
  • Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights.

5. Data Security

We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information. However, please be aware that no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. If you have any concerns, please contact us.

6. Third-Party Links

Our website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these other sites.

7. Your Rights

You may have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights or if you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us using the information below.

8. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

9. Contact Information

If you have questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

tailstrained@gmail.com
